title: When I set header to 'application/json; charset=utf-8', I got TypeError with payload.
body:
I added a custom header in the reference document, and then set the Content-Type to application/json; charset=utf-8.

```js
fastify.get('/', function (request, reply) {
  // Your code
  reply
    .code(200)
    .header('Content-Type', 'application/json; charset=utf-8')
    .send({ hello: 'world' })
})
```
But I got the following error message.

>    throw new TypeError(`Attempted to send payload of invalid type '${typeof payload}'. Expected a string or Buffer.`)
    ^
> TypeError: Attempted to send payload of invalid type 'object'. Expected a string or Buffer.
    at onSendEnd (/Users/jweboy/GitRepo/node-server/node_modules/fastify/lib/reply.js:196:11)
    at onSendHook (/Users/jweboy/GitRepo/node-server/node_modules/fastify/lib/reply.js:158:5)
    at _Reply.Reply.send (/Users/jweboy/GitRepo/node-server/node_modules/fastify/lib/reply.js:80:3)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/jweboy/GitRepo/node-server/app.js:83:6)
    at preHandlerCallback (/Users/jweboy/GitRepo/node-server/node_modules/fastify/lib/handleRequest.js:85:30)
    at next (/Users/jweboy/GitRepo/node-server/node_modules/fastify/lib/hookRunner.js:8:7)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/Users/jweboy/GitRepo/node-server/app.js:27:3)
    at hookIterator (/Users/jweboy/GitRepo/node-server/node_modules/fastify/lib/handleRequest.js:75:10)
    at next (/Users/jweboy/GitRepo/node-server/node_modules/fastify/lib/hookRunner.js:12:20)
    at hookRunner (/Users/jweboy/GitRepo/node-server/node_modules/fastify/lib/hookRunner.js:26:3)

Then I find relevant instructions in the documentation.
> As noted above, if you are sending JSON objects, send will serialize the object with fast-json-stringify if you set an output schema, otherwise JSON.stringify() will be used.

According to the understanding of the document, if it is a JSON object, the send function will automatically output the serialization, but why do you expect the value to be a string or a Buffer?

This is my project configurationï¼š
* *node version*: 8.6.0
* *fastify version*: >=1.4.0
* *os*: Mac
